text: The Bounty Hunter is a comedy-action movie of 2010. The movie is about a bounty hunter. He has to retrieve his ex-wife because she didn't go to court after paying bail. Gerard Butler plays Milo Boyd. Jennifer Aniston plays Nicole. This movie got bad reviews from the critics. It made money anyway. Category:2010 comedy movies Category:2010 action movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Andy Tennant
title: The Bounty Hunter (movie)
